head.description: A project that allows the user to view a map in the game Escape From Tarkov and show the current location and share it with friends.
head.title: Tarkov Live Map
main.description: A project that allows the user to view a map in the game Escape From Tarkov and show the current location and share it with friends.
map.title: Map
map.initDialog.title: Please select tarkov screenshot folder.
map.initDialog.description: You need to specify your own folder for Tarkov's screenshots for the real-time location display feature. If you don't want to specify a screenshot folder and just want to see your friend's location, press Close this dialog.
map.initDialog.toast.permissionDenied.de: This app requires full read/write access to the screenshots folder. Please select the folder and allow the permission request that follows.
